set.name: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Great Mecha King

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Great Mecha King. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever this creature blocks, after the battle, untap this creature. ■ Meteorburn—When this creature would leave the battle zone, you may choose a card under this creature and put it into your graveyard instead. If you do, this creature stays in the battle zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Great Mecha King

property.name: Rules
Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Zombie Dragon/Tyranno Drake

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Zombie Dragons or Tyranno Drakes. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you put it on top of a Tyranno Drake, look at your opponent's hand and discard a card from it. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, if the card under it is a Dragon, you may destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon/Tyranno Drake

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When your opponent casts a spell, return this creature from the battle zone to your hand. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BIO KICK} - Whenever one of your Dreammate attacks your opponent and isn't blocked, you may discard this card from your hand. If you do, search your deck. Take a creature from your deck that has the same name as the attacking creature, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Saint Head

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures for each of your Arc Seraphim in the battle zone. Then tap all chosen creatures.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Apollonia Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, search your deck. You may take a Dragon from it, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Great Mecha King

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {LIFE GATE}: Great Mecha King or Machine Hero (When this creature is destroyed, you may return a Great Mecha King or Machine Hero, or one of each, from your graveyard to your hand. If you do, put this creature on the bottom of your deck instead.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Machine Hero

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top card of your deck for each of your Great Mecha Kings in the battle zone. Put one of those cards into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Grand Devil

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent uses "shield trigger", you may draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Liquid People

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BIO TACKLE} Whenever one of your Liquid People attacks, you may discard this card from your hand at the start of the battle. If you do, each of your attacking creatures gets +1000 power for each card in your hand until the end of the turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Deep Marine

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your opponent's tapped creatures gets -1000 power for each of your Grand Devils in the battle zone until the end of the turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Zombie Dragon

property.name: Rules
Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Tyranno Drake

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent uses the "shield trigger" ability of one of their shields, your opponent discards a card from their hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Tyranno Drake

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Tyranno Drake. ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "speed attacker". ■ At the end of each of your turns, return all your other creatures in the battle zone to your hand. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Brave Spirit

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your opponent's creature that has power 2000 or less for each of your Tyranno Drake in the battle zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

card.name: Yulin, Ferry of the River Styx

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {LIFE GATE}: Dreammate or Vehicle Bee (When this creature is destroyed, you may return a Dreammate or Vehicle Bee, or one of each, from your graveyard to your hand. If you do, put this creature on the bottom of your deck instead.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Dreammates. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's evolution creatures in the battle zone and put it into its owner's mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Vehicle Bee

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone for each of your Dreammate in the battle zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Arc Seraphim

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent uses "shield trigger", you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Guardians. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses a race. Whenever one of your creatures battles a creature with a race other than the chosen, your creatures gets +6000 power.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Great Mecha King

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at 3 of your shields. You may take a Machine Hero that costs 3 or less from among them and put it into the battle zone. If you do, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever your opponent puts a card in your mana zone into your graveyard, you may return that card to your mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Poseidia Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Race
property.value: Great Mecha King

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BIO KICK} - Whenever one of your Great Mecha King attacks your opponent and isn't blocked, you may discard this card from your hand. If you do, draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Grand Devil

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. From among them, you may put a Deep Marine that costs 3 or less into the battle zone, and put the rest on the top of your deck in any order.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Grand Devil

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever one of your other Grand Devils is destroyed, choose one of your opponent's shields and put it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Grand Devil

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BIO KICK} - Whenever one of your Grand Devil attacks your opponent and isn't blocked, you may discard this card from your hand. If you do, your attacking creatures get "double breaker" until the end of your turn. (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Tyranno Drake

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a Brave Spirit that costs 3 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature gets +2000 power for each of your Fire Birds in the battle zone. ■ While you have a Fire Bird in the battle zone, this creature has "double breaker".

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy a Saint Head, Deep Marine, Brave Spirit, or Machine Hero that costs 3 or less.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ At the end of your turn, destroy this creature. {LIFE GATE}: Human (When this creature would be destroyed, you may return a Human from your graveyard to your hand. If you do, put this creature on the bottom of your deck instead.) }

property.name: Race

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a Saint Head that costs 3 or less from your mana zone into the battle zone.

property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You can put an evolution creature of any race on this creature.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Galaxy Vortex evolution—Put on top of 3 of your Arc Seraphims, Dreammates, and/or Great Mecha Kings. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. You may summon any number of creatures from among them for no cost. Then put the rest of the cards into your graveyard. {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Galaxy Vortex evolution—Put on top of 3 of your Grand Devils, Tyranno Drakes, Deep Marines and/or Brave Spirits. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all cards under all evolution creatures into their owners' graveyards. ■ Goal Life Gate: Grand Devil, Tyranno Drake, Deep Marine, Brave Spirit (When this creature would be destroyed, you may return any number of Grand Devils, Tyranno Drakes, Deep Marines, and Brave Spirits from your graveyard to your hand. If you do, put this creature on the bottom of your deck instead.) {TRIPLE BREAKER}

If you do, you may choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them. {DOUBLE BREAKER}
